ValidationMessage.name: CasTripListFillInAllValues
ValidationMessage.comment: All fields need to be filled with values.

ValidationMessage.name: CasTripListCheckDaterange
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: Please enter a Date Thru that is greater than Date From.
ValidationMessage.comment: Day value cannot be 'No Day' for Daily Type.

ValidationMessage.name: CasTripListCheckDay
ValidationMessage.defaultMessage: For type as Daily, Day value cannot be No Day.
ValidationMessage.comment: Day value cannot be 'No Day' for Daily Type.
